channel.title: Mathscantor Cybersecurity Blog
channel.description: Recent content on Mathscantor Cybersecurity Blog

item.title: Getting Root Shell Mikrotik RouterOS
item.description: 1. Introduction I was digging through some of the stuff I did previously several years ago and I thought that this technique may come in handy one day for researchers doing Vulnerability Research on Mikrotik RouterOS systems. For those that have already done their hands-on spinning up a Mikrotik RouterOS with the default installation on a VM, you will quickly realize that you are restricted to only using the MikroTik Command Line Interface.

item.title: Welcome Stranger
item.description: Introduction Hello there, I do not know how you manage to come here but I welcome you nevertheless. For those of you who may not know me, I am but a simple cyber security researcher. This blog would serve as a way to document down technical details of vulnerabilities / useful workflows I found while progressing through my career. Goals The aim of this blog is to teach other researchers tricks and tips that they may not have known.
